attributes.action: Dismiss Boris Johnson as Prime Minister.
attributes.additional_details: This man needs to be dismissed from politics before his cavalier approach causes irreversible damage to people’s lives.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson has proved time and again that he is not fit to serve the country in politics. Take his time as foreign secretary for example. He has sat on the fence with Brexit and decided at the last minute which side best suits his political career. He has caused too much damage already.
